name: Masters Bucket Hat
description: Masters bucket hat. I got this at the 2022 Masters Tournament. It is in great condition and has been worn a few times. It is a great hat for keeping the sun out of your eyes while playing golf. It is a size medium.

name: Masters Bucket Hat
description: Polka dotted Masters bucket hat. I got this at the 2021 Masters Tournament. It is in great condition and has been worn every time I go golfing, which is only like 4 times a year.
